name: It's a Small World (Aviv871 Games)
description:
A story of a small world , a cat and a box .

Rocks aren’t so friendly apparently .

The only game where you can find out how it is to wear two hats !

Remember, you know what they say:

“It’s a small world”.

The idea behind the game: The Many-Worlds Interpretation.

Controls:

  • A \ S \ Q \ W for jumping
  • Spacebar for dialogs

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38 (theme: "Small world").
